s.text: Smith tells the WP that the money contributed "had nothing to do with the meeting he had with Clinton."

And, the paper reports, less than three weeks after that tete-a-tete, Federal Express gave $100,000 to the DNC, part of a total of $275,000 in soft money that the company ponied up to the Democrats during the last election cycle.

The Bosnia action, an assault on the Banja Luka police HQ and several other police facilities, all thought to be centers of support for war criminal suspect Radovan Karadzic against Bosnian Serb President Biljana Plavsic, met with no resistance and resulted in the confiscation of truckloads of weapons from Karadzic supporters.
